/>
Introduction
This topic contains information about the assignment of claims folder numbers and establishing claims folders, including
associating records with a claims folder number
how claims folders and numbers are established
checking for a previously established or duplicate claims folder number
, and
handling missing or discrepant Beneficiary Identification and Records Locator Subsystem (BIRLS) and corporate records
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A - Establishing New and Converting Old Claims Folders
citation: Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A
